name: Force Pike
Lore: 'Uses microscopic vibrations emitted from its tip. Cuts through stone, metal, and bone. Ceremonial weapon for most; deadly implement in the hands of an Emperor''s Royal Guard.',
Text: 'Deploy on your Royal Guard (or use 3 Force to deploy on your other warrior). Adds 1 to defense value. May target a character or creature using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value. If hit by a Royal Guard, target''s power = 0.',
